author: aerian
post_text: October 31, 2021 at 7:54 PM#1Hello,In the Demoshow "demo dimmer and more.show.gz", there is a sequence "Look" which use effects 40 and 43. I select all fixtures and I do please twice, then I store it in a Preset All. When I recall my Preset, the fixtures are not in the expected state (the effect ID is empty in the Effect Layer of the Fixture View).I try to store it again in a other sequence it's ok.I try to store it in a Preset All without the Preset Filter and I allow Embedded.So it is not possible to store Effect ID in a Preset All ?Thanks again for you help !Best regards.
title: Store Effect ID
